1111221.content:
A sudden unexplainable rush hit Golu, forcing her to lean against the walls of the machine to steady herself. As the dizzy spell passed, the door opened up and Golu stepped out. She patted herself down experimentally. Yep, everything seemed to be in working order.

"Thanks Bulma. That was weird but I'm glad to be me again!"

Bulma smiled, trying to keep from laughing right out. The machine worked perfectly alright. Now she just had to see what else Golu thought was "normal".

"Thanks for helping me test it out. Anything you need help with?"

Goku brushed her hair out from her eyes, considering carefully.

111122111.content:
Goku pulled on her outfit with a look of disdain.

"You should definitely treat me to a shopping spree at the mall. I can't stand being in these tacky clothes."

Bulma blinked in surprise. "Uh, yeah, sure thing. Anything for my friend."

Goku smile widely, clasping her hands together. "Perfect. Two gorgeous girls enjoying a day at the mall."

This was getting weird. Maybe she should change Goku back. But on the other hand, she didn't have many friends to shop with. This could be a lot of fun.
111122111.title: Prissy fashionista

choices: She turns Goku loose on the town
She tries to trick her into changing back
1111221121.content:
Goku fiddled with her gi nervously.

"Well, Gohan hasn't been sleeping well recently. I worry about him, as strong as he is. Do you have anything for that?" She raised a hand to her mouth in realization. "And I still need to get groceries before I get home..."

Bulma failed to hide a smirk. Goku as a worried mother? She'd expect an overbearing Chi-Chi type if anything.
1111221121.title: A motherly housewife

11112211211.content:
"I'm about done here, you go on ahead. I'll see what I can get him, alright? Don't you worry."

Goku sighed in relief, grasping Bulma's hand. "Thank you Bulma. I'm so glad I ran into a friend like you all those years ago."

Bulma's smile strained a little but she kept her cool. She just wanted to see what Goku did on her own, but she was starting to wonder if this was a good idea... "Me too. Tell Gohan and Chi Chi I said hi."

Goku nodded happily before going on her way. Maybe she should at least warn Chi Chi...

It didn't take long for Goku to reach the store. She was glad she didn't pick out a dress, imagine trying to fly in that. Still, she missed the feeling of a long dress. She briefly debated buying something for herself before deciding against it. She shouldn't be too frivolous, she had Gohan's education to think about.

Lost in thought, Goku didn't notice the figure in front of her until she had bumped into them. "Oh, I'm so sorry, I wasn't watching where I was going."

Her eyebrows raised in surprise. Oh, it was...
11112211211.title: She turns Goku loose on the town

15.content: Do you want Trunks or someone else?
15.title: Trunks

1512.content: What does he turn into?
1512.title: inanimate

151211.content:
Trunks found it a bit strange that android 18 had been revived when he returned from the future. He had been tempted to judge his former teammates moral but had decided mostly to keep towards himself. That was until she up and confronted him.

Suprisingly she was rather pleasent and although she had opened the conversation by asking if he really had killed her in his timeline she played it off as a joke quickly and soon had sparked some more light hearted conversation with him.

They werent talking about much of interest really. How was the weather. How was the future going. Took up most of their conversation but trunks had enjoyed it. Having witnessed a seemingly heartless killing machine turn into an ally and possibly even a friend filled him with a sort of glow.

"Hey, do you think you could help cover me for a while?" Android 18 asked a bit too enthustiaticly.
"Umm sure? What do you need help with?" Trunks asked a bit reluctantly after being caught off guard by the sudden request.

Looking back towards the blond android trunks could see her fumbling with a sci fi esque gun before pointing it him.

"Umm... whats that supposed to-" trunks was cut off as android 18 fired at him.

The gun she had shot him with was some experimental technology. Apparently while dr gero was still around he had come to the spectular realization that there was no reason to fight if the enemy didnt even have a body. And thus he created a gun capable of transforming organic. Unfortunately the gun found itself in development hell once he had realized the energy required to pull of such a transformation. Luckily for 18 her power level was so comically high she could now easily wield the gun. And what had she turned trunks into? A cute little pink dress fluttering to the ground right now.

Picking up the transformed garment she gave it a sly smirk.
"I told you you would be covering me." Confidence was dripping out of her voice and trunks could tell he was in for the long haul.

Making a quick stop to the restroom android 18 was quick to strip out of her current outift down to her birthday suit. Doing her best to look as alluring as possible as she went to put him on, swaying her hips and vibrating her chest. Without warning she picked up the defenless pink dress and slid her body right through it. Zipping up the convenient zipper he had transformed with she admired the cute little dress in her possesion. It had an array of cute bows and ribbons with stylized buttons on it, a strong contrast to the war torn warrior he was just seconds ago.

Reminding herself that trunks had infact been turned into the dress on her right now broke her into a dress. Although she had stopped hurting people she still took pleasure in it whenever she could and having trunks as a frail dress on her divine body at her mercy turned her on to no end. She could feel the warm fluid of her sex start seeping out into trunks fabric form undoubtly saturating him with her taste scent and bodily fluids.

"I hope you dont mind trunks. But im getting a bit hot in you." she emphasized by pressing her dripping organ flush against his face.
"This is the perfect time to get you accustomed to your new position." She said seductively as she brought her hand down onto her crotch and begin rubbing pulling at trunks with each stroke.
151211.title: Android 18

She answered. "No worried Bulma I can get for you but you have wait until your parents are sleeping" I said as she slowly smile. I mean did have feeling for Bulma since day she find me and take me home every since then I been fantasizing me be human as we make love together or sometimes her be cat! But now here she is completely Tranform into cat! Filled my wild fantasizg to come true! "Aww they act shy that adorable" Panchy said. "I wouldn't be surprised if Scratch desire to mate with snowflake" Dr.Brief as he got up and leave with his wife Panchy! Leave me and Bulma alone together!

15532222.content: Why hasn't anyone decided to choose Cell?
15532222.title: someone else

choices: Absorbing 18 first causes him to become Female
1553222211.content:
Piccolo and Android 17 were still fighting on the small atoll near Kame House. Androids 18 and 16 were watching from a distance. 16 warned 17 of Piccolo's increased power due to fusing with Kami. 17 wasn't afraid. The two seemed evenly matched, and their battle was keeping their full attention. 18 was bored; she was sitting quietly on a rock, while 16 leaned against a tree. She was hoping that the battle would be interesting; but so far Piccolo just wouldn't go down.

"This is so lame," 18 said. "Piccolo can't outlast 17...why can't he just tell us where Goku is and live a little longer?"

"Confirm," 16 said. "He should reveal Goku's location. I would like to kill him now."

"Of course you do," 18 said. She was getting fed up with 16's lack of personality. He didn't respond to anything either of them said to him, unless it involved Goku. "Whatever...Let me know what happens," 18 said standing up. She began to leave the area. "I'm going to go for a walk."

16 kept his eyes on the battle. Fusing with Kami increased Piccolo's power to dangerous levels. He barely noticed that 18 had left. But it didn't matter...something else was keeping its eyes on the female Android...Something sinister and silent.

18 wandered away from the fight and walked along the beach. She grumpily kicked a pebble into the water. Cell was just over the hill, watching her. He'd been surveying the battle for a while. It wasn't hard to find; Piccolo's power level brought him right to it. He knew that if Piccolo was powering up this high, he must've been in battle with the Androids. However, even though he was now more than a match for Piccolo after absorbing enough people, he was cautious. Piccolo was capable of either destroying the Androids or letting them get away. Plus, there was a third android. If they decided to join forces and gang up on him, he could be in serious trouble.

He decided to take a more...Covert approach. And now 18 had given him a great opening. He slowly descended from the hill and emerged from foliage.
"Hello there, beautiful," Cell said with a raspy voice.

18 quickly turned around to see she was no longer alone. The sight of Cell frightened her. "What the Hell are you?"

"I'm an Android created by Dr. Gero...just like you," Cell said. "I'm only a...more advanced type of android."

"So the old man's idea of an advanced Android is a giant bug monster?" 18 asked, now more on guard.

"But wait, there's more," Cell began to say. "I have the ability and the means of becoming...Perfect. The ultimate fighting life form. But in order for me to achieve my perfection...I need you and your brother, Android 17."

"And what exactly does that mean?" 18 asked now taking a fighting stance.

"Well I could tell you," Cell said. "But I wouldn't want to ruin the surprise; you'll just have to wait and see!"

Suddenly Cell vanished. 18 was alarmed and was about to call for help, when suddenly Cell appeared in front of her and struck her in the stomach. She bent over; he was incredibly fast. He suddenly teleported behind her and struck her in the back with his knee. He grabbed her face and held a hand over her mouth.
"Sorry for being so rough with you, darling," Cell said. "But I will stop at nothing to achieve my perfection. Don't struggle...don't fight it...Don't worry...You're about to become a crucial part of the most powerful being in the universe."

18 struggled desperately against this monster. What exactly did he need from her? Cell's tail raised above them both. She saw it come above her head. Was he going to stab her with it? But then suddenly, the stinger on the tail opened up and spread out above her body, covering her in shadow almost like an umbrella. 18 could see the slimy red insides of Cell's tail...and she realized the awful truth. This monster was going to eat her!

Suddenly the tail came down over 18's head and shoulders. Cell released her once his tail had its grip on her. The muscles in his tail flexed and 18 was pulled up into the tail, up to her waist. Another convulsion and she was up to her knees. She struggled hardest now. In the darkness of Cell's insides, she fought with all her might. She would not allow herself to die like this. She was now inside up to her ankles, her body mostly forming a large lump in Cell's tail, being dragged closer and closer to his body. And with a final convulsion, her feet were sucked inside; Android 18 completely disappearing from view.

Cell sighed contently, knowing that his sister android was now absorbed into his body. He could feel her being broken up and her components absorbed into his bio-mechanical physiology. His body began to glow brightly and he released a shockwave of power. He felt his body beginning to change. He was transforming!
1553222211.title: If he absorbed #18 first

info.brief_description: Transformation adventures in the dragonball universe
info.description:
A interactive story about characters from the anime series called Dragonball change into a variety of other things like another character, an object, or even into a character from another anime.

Everything is allowed.
For example: inanimate transformations
Tg transformations
Body swap
Or more
All things listed above are allowed and welcomed. Even anything not listed is welcome.
Let your imagination run wild and have fun. I do not have any rules to what you add.

For more information about the characters and series visit http://dragonball.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page
